resources.string:
RU Mobile is an open-source project developed by Rutgers OSS.

Visit us on GitHub at github.com/rutgersmobile!

Copyright 2015, Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.

RU Mobile for Android uses the following open-source libraries:

\t Android Query
\t by AndroidQuery.com

\t Apache Commons Lang
\t by the Apache Software Foundation

\t JDeferred
\t by Ray Tsang

\t GSON
\t by Google Inc.

\t ListViewAnimations
\t by Niek Haarman

\t PagerSlidingTabStrip
\t by Andreas Stuetz

\t StickyListHeaders
\t by Emil Sjölander
